Actions.Text: REFERENCE CHANGED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to applying the Housing Stability and Tenant Protection Act of 2019 to rent calculations and rent records maintenance and destruction
Summary: Relates to applying the Housing Stability and Tenant Protection Act of 2019 to rent calculations and rent records maintenance and destruction for all rent stabilized apartments.
ActClause: AN ACT to apply the Housing Stability and Tenant Protection Act of 2019 to rent calculations and rent records maintenance and destruction
